website_summaries.verdict: It's somewhat pricey, but safety is the number-one concern of this well-constructed lanyard.
cons: Included storage bag is not up to par

customer_reviews.title: Single snap hook ((STAMPED ALL OVER)) its good to go
customer_reviews.text: EVENT RIGGERS STAND UP!!!!!! ok now all the other Fall-pro-needy types, check this lanyard out!!! Single snap hook ((STAMPED ALL OVER)) its good to go...... the Rebar hooks, pelican hooks, oversized gated....shut up corporate fall prevention expert, who doubles as the assistant to the regional sales manager, enough about me, im a concert rigger, the solid construction and ease of use, helps me float around during transitions, comfortable, shock pack is well built.....so if you need a reason, 70 bucks, a reason not to buy it, your light bill is due next week but as soon as you have it, order this cheers, maybe ill see you on the grid.....
customer_reviews.author: joseph doniero

customer_reviews.title: US made, steel all the way thru.  Checks the boxes for a fall arrest.
customer_reviews.text: This was my best affordable option that was US made. I have not tested the shock pack and don't plan to. The gate of the hooks isn't the smoothest, but it functions properly and it is steel so it is going to be heavier and clunkier than aluminum and there's no way around that. I trust my life to these and do not see a reason to switch to something else. If I experience any problems I will update this review.
customer_reviews.author: Ian S

customer_reviews.title: Great lanyard
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this product. Unfortunately one of our employees removed the plastic over the shock absorber. I checked with KwikSafety and they said that rendered the unit unusable. I would have preferred that this was more clear on the packaging. However, KwikSafety gave me a discount on a replacement. Great customer service!
customer_reviews.author: weezerwil

customer_reviews.title: seem sturdy and well built
customer_reviews.text: Luckily, I have not yet tested their full capability, and hopefully never will, but I trust my life to the product, so hopefully its a good one.
customer_reviews.author: Kamden

customer_reviews.title: SAFETY First! 35-ft PALM TREE done!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a 5'3' 150 lbs. This is my 2nd safety lanyard along with the THUNDER kit. Don't take any chances!
customer_reviews.author: IRIS R DEGUZMAN

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I'm happy to say I haven't tested the fall arresting capability, but the hooks are robust and easy to operate with one hand, even in heavy gloves.
customer_reviews.author: Chris S.

customer_reviews.title: Tough, heavy
customer_reviews.text: Seems tough enough, though thankfully I've not yet put it to the test - and I hope I never do...
customer_reviews.author: MPH

customer_reviews.title: Amazing awesome
customer_reviews.text: Awesome hope I never have to use it for its purpose but it's the one our trainer said to get
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Bagwell

customer_reviews.title: Little heavy, but worth the protection.
customer_reviews.text: Used this to attach to fall protection harness. Needed the larger shackle and this was perfect. Little heavy, but your getting protection!
customer_reviews.author: George Tapling

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This works well on my harness, so much better than small hooks.
customer_reviews.author: Lack

customer_reviews.title: Needs storage bag
customer_reviews.text: The storage bag ripped the moment I put the harness in it. The actual equipment is high quality.
customer_reviews.author: James V. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Just as described! Good and sturdy product. Husband uses for Surveying Job.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Life saver
customer_reviews.text: Durable and price right. Pelican hook makes it easy to attach to tie off points. Good product
customer_reviews.author: Northern1

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product but was not what I needed. I made a mistake in my order.
customer_reviews.author: ravi

customer_reviews.title: Same as picture
customer_reviews.text: Great lanyard, hooks are not heavy at all. Move freely and faster around scaffolds.
customer_reviews.author: =M=

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic item to protect you and potentially save your life
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality harness... Needed this for secure latching on to rope while doing roof work and this was just a perfect fit. The clips are a little bit heavy at the ends but they provide a very secure attachment point so it's worth it. This item is capable of carrying quite a bit of weight. Well over the capacity of my weight, so I feel very confident when I use it. The nylon straps or a good gauge and their overall feel of the product is quality. I received this item at a discounted rate in exchange for my honest feedback and unbiased review.
customer_reviews.author: SanFranReviews

customer_reviews.title: Great double leg
customer_reviews.text: super strong and well made double leg. Perfect for any climb in need of position and safety. I always recommend double legs so I can always be locked off to something. I received this product at a discount for an honest review.
customer_reviews.author: L

product_meta.title: KwikSafety (Charlotte, NC) PYTHON | Double Leg 6ft Tubular Stretch Safety Lanyard | OSHA ANSI Fall Protection | EXTERNAL Shock Absorber | Construction Arborist Roofing | Snap & Rebar Hook Connector
feature_bullets: WHO – “We Don’t Cut Corners on Safety” | The KwikSafety PYTHON is a double leg, heavy duty, high performance safety lanyard that meets and exceeds the standards of ANSI Z359.13-2013. Be seen and be safe with the fluorescent yellow 1 inch wide polyester webbing. Use with any compatible fall protection safety harness, free fall (FF) lanyards, energy absorbers, lifelines, and anchorage lanyards. Safely perform the job knowing the PYTHON fall protection lanyard has your back!

WHAT – “All the Safety Bells and Whistles” | The self-locking rebar and snap hooks meet ANSI Z359.12 and CSA Z259.12 standards and have a tensile strength of 5,000lbs and gate strength of 3,600lbs. Both hooks (2 rebar, 1 snap) allow for ease of use around construction site scaffolding, I-beams, and concrete structures. Expandable webbing allows for a maximum deployment distance of 48 inches (1.2 meters). User weight capacity ranges from 130-310lbs (includes worker weight, clothing, and tools).

WHEN – “To Make a Long Safety Story Short” | The 6 foot (1.8 meters) PYTHON safety lanyard comes completely equipped with an external shock absorbing pack that deploys in the event of a fall to reduce impact forces and acceleration to minimize injury. Average arresting force is 900lbs (4kN). If the shock absorber has been deployed or compromised in any event, it is no longer in working condition and can lead to injury and OSHA citation if use is continued.

WHERE – “Spill the Safety Beans” | Use the KwikSafety PYTHON positioning lanyard in wet, dry, hot, or cold weather thanks to the high tensile strength and top quality static and dynamic performance. Make the PYTHON a part of your Industrial Safety PPE (personal protection equipment) for jobs/workplaces such as arborists, roofing, climbing, logging, inspection, emergency and rescue services, military, gutter cleaning, and other professional workplaces.

WHY – “STRAIGHT FROM THE SAFETY HORSE’S MOUTH” | KwikSafety products are proudly designed & shipped from Charlotte, NC, USA. Our Charlotte-based team will quickly answer any and all of your questions and concerns about your order in English or Spanish, si habla Espanol (cordón de seguridad, cordón de protección contra caídas). KwikSafety products are premium stylish safety products designed by Americans with American Standard level of quality. If you have a problem, we have a solution.
